data.text:
Located right next to the Espanya metro line, this hotel is in a prime location. The Red L1, Green L3 & Pink L8 Lines will get you to/from here. There is also a taxi rank near the hotel and the airport bus picks up and stops at this location also. The N-340 road it is located on contains many convenience stores, eateries and the Hostafrancs Market. It is very close to Arenas de Barcelona (a shopping centre) and a lovely 10-minute stroll away from the Magic Fountain and the National Catalan Art Museum.

The hotel is environmentally conscious offering an incentive to guests who limit the number of times they get their room serviced. They also encourage you to take shorter showers and provided a Spotify code you could scan which took you to a playlist of songs lasting 4 minutes which I thought was cool. The room keys were made of wood rather than plastic and the takeaway coffee cups they provided at breakfast were recyclable and did not come with a plastic lid.

We stayed in a Superior room with breakfast included. The room was clean and the bed was comfortable. The hotel offers guests a pillow menu to ensure an enjoyable sleep. The storage space for folded clothes was quite limited with limited shelving but there were a good number of hangers provided for larger items of clothing. As a result of the limited storage in the room, there was no ironing board or iron but there was a clothes steamer provided which did the job perfectly well. The room had a safe, tea and coffee making facilities as well as a mini fridge with two bottles of water provided free of charge.

There are USB ports in the room to charge your things and good access to power sockets as well.

Breakfast was served between 7 am and 10:30 am and offered hot and cold options designed to cater to anyone's palate. The scrambled eggs were tasty and the fresh pineapple was delicious. We found it a great way to start our day.

The reception staff spoke good English and helped with any questions we had. They were kind enough to hold our luggage for us when we checked out at noon and returned at 6 pm for our 9 pm flight at no cost.

The hotel has a swimming pool and bar on the top floor - access to which is gained through your room key. The swimming pool is quite small and narrow - not the kind of pool you would be doing lengths in. The rooftop bar was closed when we were there but it did offer beautiful views of Montjuic and the Barcelona skyline. Despite both areas being out of commission (probably because of the season) it is well worth a visit up there.

If I were coming back to Barcelona, I would definitely consider staying here again.
data.title: Occidentally in love...

owner_response.title: Owner response
owner_response.text:
Dear Seamus,
Thank you for reviewing your stay with us.

We regret to hear that the storage options in our rooms did not fully meet your expectations. We aim to provide a balance between sleek design and functionality, and we appreciate your feedback as it helps us consider future improvements. 
It is heartening to learn that you found our location to be advantageous for exploring Barcelona and that our environmental initiatives resonated with you. We are also pleased that the room amenities, including the comfort of your bed and our pillow menu, contributed positively to your experience. Your kind words regarding our staff service and the convenience of our luggage storage are greatly valued, as we strive to make our guests' experiences seamless and enjoyable. Additionally, we are delighted that you enjoyed our breakfast selection and found the charging facilities in the room to be sufficient for your needs. While our rooftop bar was not open during your stay, we are glad you could still appreciate the stunning views of Montjuic, and we hope that on your next visit, you will have the opportunity to enjoy this space to the fullest.

We hope to welcome you again in the future. 
Best regards,

Occidental Barcelona 1929
owner_response.author: Hotel- cmanager

data.text: Everything was very good. Bedding is perfect, great mattress and pillows. I highly recommend to take the room with breakfast - itâ€™s tasty, with good variety of food and drinks. Will not recommend to stay in standard room with a friend or colleague as the bathroom doors are just glass and there is NO soundproof! You can hear everything your partner does in the toilet.
data.title: Good hotel with perfect location

owner_response.title: Owner response
owner_response.text:
Dear Marina,
We appreciate that you took the time to share your experience with us.

We are sorry to hear that the design of our standard room bathrooms did not meet your expectations for privacy. Our hotel aims to provide a comfortable and restful environment, and we regret any discomfort this may have caused.
We are glad to know that you found our bedding to be of great quality, providing a perfect rest, and that our breakfast selection met your approval with its tasty variety. Your recommendation for choosing a room with breakfast is much appreciated, as we strive to offer our guests a delightful start to their day.

We look forward to the pleasure of welcoming you back on future occasions.
Best regards,

Occidental Barcelona 1929
owner_response.author: Hotel- cmanager

data.text:
A great hotel in the Centre of the city with great staff. Room was perfect and breakfast was good.
I can recommend this hotel for weekend breaks and for being in the Centre of the action. Will return next time.
data.title: Stay in Barcelona

owner_response.title: Owner response
owner_response.text:
Dear Guest,
Thank you for taking the time to review your stay.

We are thrilled to hear that our central location served as the perfect base for your activities in the city and that our team's efforts contributed positively to your experience. It's wonderful to know that the room met your expectations and that you started your days on the right note with our breakfast offerings.
We appreciate your recommendation for weekend breaks and are glad that you're already planning your return.

The entire team look forward to welcoming you back for a future visit.
Kind regards,

Occidental Barcelona 1929
owner_response.author: Hotel- cmanager

data.text: Very close to Plaza Espana, newly renovated, extremely clean, comfortable rooms, excellent service. The facilities are well maintained, staff is courteous, excellent return on your investment. Will go back any time. The beds are comfortable, great pillows and sheets.
data.title: Clean, close to everything, amiable staff

user_location.name: Halifax, Halifax Regional Municipality, Nova Scotia

data.text: Good and modern hotel. Nice rooms with bathrooms, fridge and watercooker. Very quiet rooms. Small restaurant for breakfast and a nice bar. Also a bar on the roof. Swimming pool also on the roof, but that was out of order. You must use your card not only to get into your room but also to get there with the elevators. Safe feeling. Nice staff and helpful. Good breakfast. But donâ€™t come late because the restaurant is than full and than you have to sit on high chairs.
data.title: Good 4 star hotel on a central place

owner_response.title: Owner response
owner_response.text:
Dear Jos, 
Thank you very much for your kind feedback.

We apologize for any inconvenience caused by the swimming pool being out of order during your visit. It's our aim to provide all our facilities in top condition, and we regret that this was not the case for you. We're also sorry to hear that the breakfast area was crowded; we strive to ensure a comfortable dining experience for all our guests. 
We're delighted to know that you found the hotel modern, with quiet rooms that met your expectations for comfort and amenities. Your kind words about our helpful staff and the overall service quality are greatly appreciated. It's also wonderful to hear that you enjoyed the good breakfast and felt secure with our elevator card access system.

We look forward to welcoming you back for another memorable experience.
Best wishes,

Occidental Barcelona 1929
